column3: [[1982]]) was a scholar of Anglo-Saxon poetry and history. She was a colleague of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] at the [[University of Oxford]] from [[1930]] until [[1957]]
column4: when she became Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon at the [[Cambridge|University of Cambridge]].<ref>{{CG|I}}
